telemetry.enabled.description: Enable or disable anonymous usage metrics collection.

telemetry.hide.tables.description: Hides telemetry tables from `select * from tables()` output. As a result, telemetry tables will not be visible in the Web Console table view.

telemetry.queue.capacity.description: Capacity of the internal telemetry queue, which is the gateway of all telemetry events. This queue capacity does not require tweaking.
